name: NegativeDepressionScreening
title: Negative Depression Screening
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent situations in which a depression screen was performed by the health care professional and the finding was negative for depression.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with screening for depression whereby the outcome is negative.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
